@@ -22,1 +45,3 @@
-@Fork(value = 3, jvmArgs = { "--enable-native-access=ALL-UNNAMED", "-Djava.library.path=micro/native" })

+        "-Djava.library.path=micro/native",
+        "--add-opens=java.base/jdk.internal.misc=ALL-UNNAMED" })
